paper_abstract: In this paper the existence and uniqueness of solutions for second-order fuzzy differential equations with initial conditions under generalized H-differentiability is proved. To this end, the concept of second-order generalized differential equation is defined, which is based on an enlargement of the class of differentiable fuzzy mappings. (C) 2008 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Toward the existence and uniqueness of solutions of second-order fuzzy differential equations
